meanings.definition: Two people who serve as joint presidents.
meanings.sent1: The copresidents worked together to lead the country.
meanings.sent2: The copresidents made decisions as a team.
meanings.sent3: The copresidents joked about having to agree on everything.
meanings.sent4: The copresidents were like two sides of the same coin.
meanings.sent5: The copresidents shared the presidential duties equally.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing the role of president with another person.
meanings.sent1: The copresidents took turns representing the country.
meanings.sent2: The copresidents alternated days in office.
meanings.sent3: The copresidents decided to split the workload evenly.
meanings.sent4: The copresidents were like a dynamic duo in leadership.
meanings.sent5: The copresidents divided the presidential responsibilities fairly.
